alert.note: Alert for Logan; Phillips; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued December 02 at 2:59PM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Eastern Washington County in northeastern Colorado... Southeastern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... Southwestern Phillips County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 500 PM MST. * At 258 PM MST, an area of dust was along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Haxtun to 8 miles southwest of Akron, or along a line extending from 20 miles west of Holyoke to 28 miles southeast of Fort Morgan, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Satellite. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Akron, Haxtun, Otis, Arickaree School, Cope, St Petersburg, Highland Center, Platner, Burdett, Lone Star and Elba. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, reduce speed and turn on your headlights and hazards.
